--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, naren_nair@h... wrote:
> hello guys
> i am a new person in this field
> i need to know why and when an AssertionFailedError occures
> is it beacuse of the way we do testing or some units need not be 
> tested. or is it beacuse of the types of assertions we use (the wrong 
> assertion at the wrong place)

I shoudl also mention that this is the whole purpose of JUnit (xUnit
by extension).  Being able to make claims about the behaviour of the
code and being notified when those claims don't hold true.

Dave
